str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Useful, gentle, pleasant, kind. From chraomai; employed, i.e. useful.
